Centered Flurry of Blows.name: Centered Flurry of Blows
Centered Flurry of Blows.flavor: Your fists become a blur as you follow up your initial attack with another, shifting your foes’ positions to your advantage.
Centered Flurry of Blows.trigger: You hit with an attack during your turn
Centered Flurry of Blows.target:
One creature
Level 11: One or two creatures
Level 21: Each enemy adjacent to you
Centered Flurry of Blows.effect: The target takes damage equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier, and you slide it 1 square to a square adjacent to you, or 1 square in any direction if the target wasn’t targeted by the triggering attack.
Centered Flurry of Blows.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Dancing Cobra [Attack Technique].name: Dancing Cobra [Attack Technique]
Dancing Cobra [Attack Technique].flavor: You dodge and weave like a cobra, confounding your enemy and turning its attacks back against it.
Dancing Cobra [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target has made an opportunity attack against you during this turn, the target takes extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Level 21: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage.

Dragon's Tail [Attack Technique].name: Dragon's Tail [Attack Technique]
Dragon's Tail [Attack Technique].flavor: Your hand lashes out like a dragon’s tail, and with the lightest touch unleashes power that knocks your foe to the ground.
Dragon's Tail [Attack Technique].target: One ally or one prone enemy
Dragon's Tail [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Level 21: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Dragon's Tail [Attack Technique].effect: You swap places with the target.

Five Storms [Attack Technique].name: Five Storms [Attack Technique]
Five Storms [Attack Technique].flavor: You move like a whirlwind, spinning as you unleash an array of kicks and punches, which slam into your foes like a storm crashing onto the shore.
Five Storms [Attack Technique].target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Five Storms [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.

Drunken Monkey [Attack Technique].name: Drunken Monkey [Attack Technique]
Drunken Monkey [Attack Technique].flavor: You lurch seemingly out of control. Your enemies are bewildered as they try to hit your swaying form, and with a cunning jab, you cause one of your foes to attack its companion.
Drunken Monkey [Attack Technique].onHit: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. The target then makes a melee basic attack as a free action against one enemy of your choice. The target gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Drunken Monkey [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain and gain a power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

Open the Gate of Battle [Attack Techniqu.name: Open the Gate of Battle [Attack Technique]
Open the Gate of Battle [Attack Techniqu.flavor: Your sudden movement catches your foe unprepared, and you launch into your attack.
Open the Gate of Battle [Attack Techniqu.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. The target takes 1d10 extra damage if it was at full hit points when you hit it with this attack.
Open the Gate of Battle [Attack Techniqu.effect: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks from the first enemy you move away from.

Masterful Spiral.name: Masterful Spiral
Masterful Spiral.flavor: With a sudden burst of motion, you deliver crushing kicks and punches of psionic force to nearby enemies.
Masterful Spiral.effect: You assume the spiral stance. Until the stance ends, your reach with melee touch attacks increases by 1.

Whirling Mantis Step.name: Whirling Mantis Step
Whirling Mantis Step.flavor: With swift steps and overwhelming leverage, you shove aside your foes and cripple them with vicious kicks.
Whirling Mantis Step.effect: You shift your speed. If you enter a square adjacent to any enemy during this shift, you slide that enemy 1 square. You can slide each enemy only once during the shift. After the shift, make the following attack.
Whirling Mantis Step.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Whirling Mantis Step.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Grasp the Wind.name: Grasp the Wind
Grasp the Wind.flavor: Before your enemy can force you back, you whirl around, using the power of its attack to propel you where you want to go.
Grasp the Wind.trigger: You are pulled, pushed, or slid
Grasp the Wind.effect: Instead of being affected by the forced movement, you shift the number of squares it would have moved you.

Harmonious Discipline.name: Harmonious Discipline
Harmonious Discipline.flavor: A specific sequence of disciplined breathing enhances both your defense and your offense.
Harmonious Discipline.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier. When you have no temporary hit points remaining, you gain a bonus to the damage roll of your next melee attack before the end of your next turn. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

Dance of Swords [Attack Technique].name: Dance of Swords [Attack Technique]
Dance of Swords [Attack Technique].flavor: As your foes swarm around you, you leap among them and turn their numbers against them.
Dance of Swords [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes extra damage equal to twice the number of enemies adjacent to you.
Dance of Swords [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. If any enemies make opportunity attacks against you during this movement and miss, you gain combat advantage against the enemies that missed until the end of your turn.

Twin Thunders [Attack Technique].name: Twin Thunders [Attack Technique]
Twin Thunders [Attack Technique].flavor: You move in a blur, tumbling around a foe, and deliver a sweeping kick with such ferocity that thunderous energy blasts both that foe and its cohort.
Twin Thunders [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and a single enemy adjacent to the target takes 1d10 thunder damage.
Twin Thunders [Attack Technique].effect: Choose one enemy adjacent to you and move your speed + 2. During this movement, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks from that enemy.

Deadly Cobra Strike.name: Deadly Cobra Strike
Deadly Cobra Strike.flavor: You weave from side to side and lash your hand forth like a striking cobra, leaving behind psionically poisoned wounds.
Deadly Cobra Strike.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

One Hundred Leaves.name: One Hundred Leaves
One Hundred Leaves.flavor: You launch a flurry of attacks, striking with such speed and might that creatures scatter before you like leaves in a hurricane.
One Hundred Leaves.onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
One Hundred Leaves.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
One Hundred Leaves.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can target one additional creature in range with your flurry of blows power.

Centered Defense.name: Centered Defense
Centered Defense.flavor: You breathe deeply. With your center strong, you calmly avoid enemy attacks.
Centered Defense.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses.

Purifying Meditation.name: Purifying Meditation
Purifying Meditation.flavor: You focus your mind inward, finding the source of what ails you and driving it away
Purifying Meditation.effect: You make a saving throw with a bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Fist of One Hundred Strikes [Attack Tech.name: Fist of One Hundred Strikes [Attack Technique]
Fist of One Hundred Strikes [Attack Tech.flavor: You move so quickly that you become a blur, as if a hundred copies of yourself suddenly sprang among your foes.
Fist of One Hundred Strikes [Attack Tech.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you shift 1 square.

Strike the Avalanche [Attack Technique].name: Strike the Avalanche [Attack Technique]
Strike the Avalanche [Attack Technique].flavor: As your blow falls, you send your foe flying across the battlefield to slam into your enemies like an avalanche.
Strike the Avalanche [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the primary target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier. Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Strike the Avalanche [Attack Technique].secondaryTarget: Each creature in the burst other than the primary target
Strike the Avalanche [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you don’t provoke opportunity attacks from prone enemies.

Strength to Weakness.name: Strength to Weakness
Strength to Weakness.flavor: You psionically perceive what your eyes cannot see: your foe’s inner weakness. You lightly touch that foe. A moment later, the agony of your attack falls upon it.
Strength to Weakness.onHit: Ongoing damage equal to 15 + your Dexterity modifier (save ends).

Twilight Touch.name: Twilight Touch
Twilight Touch.flavor: You tap your fingers against your enemies’ heads, disrupting the flow of energy through them and clouding their vision.
Twilight Touch.onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Iron Dragon Defense.name: Iron Dragon Defense
Iron Dragon Defense.flavor: You quiet your mind and shrug off the pain inflicted upon you.
Iron Dragon Defense.effect: The damage is reduced by 10 + your Wisdom modifier.

Spider Technique.name: Spider Technique
Spider Technique.flavor: The power of your mind turns walls and ceilings into floors for you.
Spider Technique.effect: You climb your speed. During this movement, you can move across overhanging surfaces, like ceilings, but you fall if you end your turn on such a surface.

Dance of the Stinging Hornet [Attack Tec.name: Dance of the Stinging Hornet [Attack Technique]
Dance of the Stinging Hornet [Attack Tec.flavor: You leap into the air and land on your foe’s back. From there, you rain blows on it.
Dance of the Stinging Hornet [Attack Tec.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the grab ends, the target grants cover to you, and if it is larger than you, you can end a move action in its space. If you do so, the target isn’t immobilized by this grab, and you remain in its space when it moves (you don’t provoke opportunity attacks as you move with it). Until you leave the target’s space, its movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks from you.
Dance of the Stinging Hornet [Attack Tec.effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start. You can use the attack technique at any point during this movement.

Overpowering Strike [Attack Technique].name: Overpowering Strike [Attack Technique]
Overpowering Strike [Attack Technique].flavor: You focus psionic energy into a single strike so powerful that your foe has trouble striking back.
Overpowering Strike [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls against you equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Way of the Autumn Wind.name: Way of the Autumn Wind
Way of the Autumn Wind.flavor: You spring into the air and perform a roundhouse kick, creating a bitter draft. You dance on the wind as it washes over your foes, draining their strength.
Way of the Autumn Wind.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier cold damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Way of the Autumn Wind.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Way of the Autumn Wind.effect: You can assume the autumn wind stance. Until the stance ends, you can shift 2 squares as an immediate reaction when you are hit by any attack.

Ring the Golden Bell.name: Ring the Golden Bell
Ring the Golden Bell.flavor: You leap up and punch at the air, causing a shimmering bolt of force to arc across the battlefield. You follow the bolt, landing at its point of impact.
Ring the Golden Bell.effect: Before the attack, you jump 10 squares. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.
Ring the Golden Bell.onHit: 4d6 + Dexterity modifier force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Ring the Golden Bell.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Diamond Mind.name: Diamond Mind
Diamond Mind.flavor: Your disciplined mind repels an attack.
Diamond Mind.effect: You gain a +5 bonus to Will against the triggering attack.

Meditative Solace.name: Meditative Solace
Meditative Solace.flavor: By focusing your mind, you banish your ills.
Meditative Solace.effect: Until the stance ends, once per round you can use a minor action to make a saving throw.

Steps of Grasping Fire [Attack Technique.name: Steps of Grasping Fire [Attack Technique]
Steps of Grasping Fire [Attack Technique.flavor: You become sheathed in flames and leave a trail of fire behind you with each step.
Steps of Grasping Fire [Attack Technique.effect: You move your speed. During this movement, any enemy that hits you takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier, and each square you leave is filled with fire until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters a fire square or starts its turn there takes fire damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Three Winds Kick [Attack Technique].name: Three Winds Kick [Attack Technique]
Three Winds Kick [Attack Technique].flavor: You move like a hurricane, dashing amid your enemies as you deliver a flurry of kicks.
Three Winds Kick [Attack Technique].onHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you shift 2 squares.
Three Winds Kick [Attack Technique].effect: Choose one enemy within 6 squares of you. You teleport to a square adjacent to that enemy.

Inevitable Fist.name: Inevitable Fist
Inevitable Fist.flavor: You strike at your foe. No matter how it tries to dodge your attack, it cannot escape.
Inevitable Fist.effect: You can assume the stance of the inevitable fist. Until the stance ends, your flurry of blows power deals 2 extra damage.

Rising Dragon Fire.name: Rising Dragon Fire
Rising Dragon Fire.flavor: You exhale an inferno to burn your enemies.
Rising Dragon Fire.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. When you hit any creature that is within the zone, that creature takes 2d6 extra fire damage.

Fist of Golden Light [Attack Technique].name: Fist of Golden Light [Attack Technique]
Fist of Golden Light [Attack Technique].flavor: Focusing your psionic energy, you transform your fist into a brand of radiance.
Fist of Golden Light [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier radiant damage. Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1 centered on the primary target.
Fist of Golden Light [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: The secondary target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Hungry Ghost [Attack Technique].name: Hungry Ghost [Attack Technique]
Hungry Ghost [Attack Technique].flavor: You transform into a spectral version of yourself, and your strike gives you vitality.
Hungry Ghost [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier necrotic damage. You gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Wisdom modifier.
Hungry Ghost [Attack Technique].effect: You are phasing and insubstantial until the end of your turn, and you move your speed.

Wandering Comet Strike.name: Wandering Comet Strike
Wandering Comet Strike.flavor: You deliver a crushing blow to one foe, focus your psionic energy to step between the worlds, and repeat this attack again.
Wandering Comet Strike.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex.  If you attack fewer than three enemies, you can make the attack twice against one of the targets.
Wandering Comet Strike.effect: After attacking a target with this power, you teleport to a square adjacent to a different enemy within 10 squares of you.

Watchful Hydra Stance.name: Watchful Hydra Stance
Watchful Hydra Stance.flavor: You make a series of quick attacks against enemies around you and assume a vigilant stance against them all.
Watchful Hydra Stance.effect: You can assume the watchful hydra stance. Until the stance ends, you can target an additional creature within 3 squares of you with your flurry of blows power.

Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique].name: Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique]
Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique].flavor: Psionic energy flows through you, whisking you through space and disrupting your enemies’ life force.
Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. You teleport to a square adjacent to an enemy within 6 squares of you. Then make a secondary attack.
Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique].secondaryTarget: One enemy other than the primary target
Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: The primary and secondary targets are dazed until the end of your next turn.
Tap the Life Well [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You teleport to a square adjacent to an enemy within 6 squares of you.

Quivering Palm.name: Quivering Palm
Quivering Palm.flavor: Your vicious blow causes supernatural agony to your foe. Slowly but surely, its life slips away.
Quivering Palm.effect: The target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Mist on the Storm.name: Mist on the Storm
Mist on the Storm.flavor: You transform into a ghostly figure and walk among your foes, your fists and feet passing through their armor like mist.
Mist on the Storm.onHit: 7d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Mist on the Storm.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Mist on the Storm.effect: You can assume the misty storm stance. Until the stance ends, you are phasing. When you are hit by an attack, as an immediate interrupt you can become insubstantial until the end of your next turn, and the stance ends.

Celestial Drunken Boxer [Attack Techniqu.name: Celestial Drunken Boxer [Attack Technique]
Celestial Drunken Boxer [Attack Techniqu.flavor: You shudder and stumble, yet there is a method to your madness. Each move is perfectly timed to mislead your enemies, causing them to attack each other.
Celestial Drunken Boxer [Attack Techniqu.onHit: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against one enemy of your choice. The target gains a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll against that enemy. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

Crane's Wings [Attack Technique].name: Crane's Wings [Attack Technique]
Crane's Wings [Attack Technique].flavor: You leap across the battlefield and kick your foe, sending it staggering backward.
Crane's Wings [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Level 21: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Crane's Wings [Attack Technique].effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance of the jump isn’t limited by your speed.

Diamond Body.name: Diamond Body
Diamond Body.flavor: Your incredible speed and resilience, born from your mastery of psionic magic, allow you to shrug off a deadly attack.
Diamond Body.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Diamond Body.effect: You gain resist 20 to all damage against the triggering attack.

Mist Walker's Step.name: Mist Walker's Step
Mist Walker's Step.flavor: With the proper focus of your psionic power, even physical obstacles are no match for you.
Mist Walker's Step.effect: You are phasing and ignore difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

Stone Fist Flurry of Blows.name: Stone Fist Flurry of Blows
Stone Fist Flurry of Blows.flavor: You lash out at another enemy after your first attack, a casual reminder of your great strength.
Stone Fist Flurry of Blows.trigger: You hit with an attack during your turn
Stone Fist Flurry of Blows.target:
One creature
Level 11: One or two creatures
Level 21: Each enemy adjacent to you
Stone Fist Flurry of Blows.effect: The target takes damage equal to 3 + your Strength modifier. If the target wasn’t targeted by the triggering attack, the damage increases by 2 (4 at 11th level and 6 at 21st level).
Stone Fist Flurry of Blows.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Awaken the Slumbering Hurt [Attack Techn.name: Awaken the Slumbering Hurt [Attack Technique]
Awaken the Slumbering Hurt [Attack Techn.flavor: Your foes’ wounds allow you to dodge at just the right angles to foil the enemies’ attacks. When you attack, you focus on a single enemy’s injuries and find the perfect place to strike.
Awaken the Slumbering Hurt [Attack Techn.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target is bloodied, it takes extra damage from both this attack and your next attack against it before the end of your next turn. The extra damage equals your Strength modifier.
Awaken the Slumbering Hurt [Attack Techn.effect: You move your speed. During this movement, bloodied enemies can’t attack you with opportunity actions or immediate actions.

Rising Storm [Attack Technique].name: Rising Storm [Attack Technique]
Rising Storm [Attack Technique].flavor: The air around you hums with power as you focus the energy within you into a roar of thunder.
Rising Storm [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Rising Storm [Attack Technique].effect: You fly your speed. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Harmonious Thunder.name: Harmonious Thunder
Harmonious Thunder.flavor: You punch one foe, then spin and deliver a kick to another. Thunder rumbles in the distance, rolls closer, and explodes between your two foes.
Harmonious Thunder.effect: The first time either one of the targets takes damage during a turn, the other target takes thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until one of the targets drops to 0 hit points.

Spinning Leopard Maneuver.name: Spinning Leopard Maneuver
Spinning Leopard Maneuver.flavor: Maintaining perfect balance, you weave a deadly path through the fray, dealing kicks and punches to each foe you pass.
Spinning Leopard Maneuver.effect: You shift your speed and can make the following attack once against each enemy that you move adjacent to during the shift.

Careful Stride.name: Careful Stride
Careful Stride.flavor: You walk with such precision and control that broken ground and even bodies of water cannot impede you.
Careful Stride.effect: Until the end of this turn, you ignore difficult terrain and can both move across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground. In addition, you move your speed.

Supreme Flurry.name: Supreme Flurry
Supreme Flurry.flavor: Your speed is a blur. Where does one strike end and another begin? It doesn’t matter as long as the blow lands.
Supreme Flurry.trigger: You use your Flurry of Blows power and resolve the effects of the power that triggered it
Supreme Flurry.effect: You shift half your speed and use your Flurry of Blows power again.

Enduring Champion [Attack Technique].name: Enduring Champion [Attack Technique]
Enduring Champion [Attack Technique].flavor: You focus your pain into a point at the end of your fist. As you strike, you deliver your ills to your enemy.
Enduring Champion [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. You can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end, with a bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier. If you save, not only does the effect end, but the target takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Enduring Champion [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. Each time you are attacked during this movement, you gain a +1 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.

Eternal Mountain [Attack Technique].name: Eternal Mountain [Attack Technique]
Eternal Mountain [Attack Technique].flavor: You focus your mind, calling on your iron discipline to walk, fight, and shrug off attacks with a mountain’s enduring spirit.
Eternal Mountain [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Eternal Mountain [Attack Technique].effect: You gain resistance to all damage equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn. In addition, you shift 2 squares.

Steel Warrior Technique.name: Steel Warrior Technique
Steel Warrior Technique.flavor: You focus your mind, drawing on psionic energy to make your skin as hard as steel. When your fist strikes, it hits with the force of a giant’s axe.
Steel Warrior Technique.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you mark the target (save ends).
Steel Warrior Technique.onMiss: Half damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Steel Warrior Technique.effect: Until this power’s mark ends on the target, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier whenever it hits you.

Supreme Avalanche Combination.name: Supreme Avalanche Combination
Supreme Avalanche Combination.flavor: A cascade of punches creates deep wounds that your future attacks can exploit.
Supreme Avalanche Combination.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the target, and you slide it 1 square whenever you hit it with an attack. If that attack includes forced movement, you can increase the distance of that movement by 1 square instead of sliding the target 1 square.

Echoing Thunder.name: Echoing Thunder
Echoing Thunder.flavor: As your blurring fists wreak havoc around you, the thunderous echo of your flurries slams into other foes.
Echoing Thunder.trigger: You use your Flurry of Blows power
Echoing Thunder.effect: Each enemy within 2 squares of you that was not damaged by your Flurry of Blows power is pushed 1 square.

Leap of the Heavens.name: Leap of the Heavens
Leap of the Heavens.flavor: You leap into the air, reaching incredible heights.
Leap of the Heavens.effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +10 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start.

Grasping Tide [Attack Technique].name: Grasping Tide [Attack Technique]
Grasping Tide [Attack Technique].flavor: You fall upon your foe like a tidal wave, delivering a series of punches and kicks that catch it within your grasp and drag it along with you.
Grasping Tide [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Grasping Tide [Attack Technique].effect: You shift 2 squares. During the shift, if you leave a square adjacent to any enemy that you have hit on this turn, you can slide that enemy 1 square into the space you vacated.

Titan's Step [Attack Technique].name: Titan's Step [Attack Technique]
Titan's Step [Attack Technique].flavor: You drop into a deep fighting stance. Each step you take carves chunks from the ground below you, and each kick you deliver crushes bone and metal.
Titan's Step [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.
Titan's Step [Attack Technique].effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start. Where you land, each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

Crane Dance.name: Crane Dance
Crane Dance.flavor: You step carefully to reach your foes, measuring their posture and fighting stance to deliver just the right amount of power to send them toppling over.
Crane Dance.target: One, two, three, or four creatures
Crane Dance.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Crane Dance.effect: You shift 2 squares after each attack.

Relentless Hound Technique.name: Relentless Hound Technique
Relentless Hound Technique.flavor: You make a quick attack against your foe, marking it with a psionic tag. Where it goes, you can follow.
Relentless Hound Technique.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when the target willingly leaves a square adjacent to you, you can shift 1 square as a free action. You can use the Relentless Hound Attack power once before the end of the encounter.

Internal Power.name: Internal Power
Internal Power.flavor: You draw on the psionic power that flows within you to knit your wounds.
Internal Power.effect: You spend a healing surge and regain 2d6 additional hit points.

Spring Up.name: Spring Up
Spring Up.trigger: You are prone at the start of your turn

Furious Bull [Attack Technique].name: Furious Bull [Attack Technique]
Furious Bull [Attack Technique].flavor: You move like an enraged bull, drawing on your psionic power to shove aside your foes and deliver vicious punches that leave them senseless.
Furious Bull [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Furious Bull [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you can move through enemies’ spaces.

Step Between the Worlds [Attack Techniqu.name: Step Between the Worlds [Attack Technique]
Step Between the Worlds [Attack Techniqu.flavor: You slip underneath the fabric of the world, emerging to fall upon your enemy with a kick, sending it through the passage you emerged from.
Step Between the Worlds [Attack Techniqu.onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Step Between the Worlds [Attack Techniqu.effect: You teleport a number of squares equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier.

Dancer on the Sea of Battle.name: Dancer on the Sea of Battle
Dancer on the Sea of Battle.flavor: You weave between enemy lines, dashing among your foes and leaving fallen warriors in your wake.
Dancer on the Sea of Battle.effect: You shift your speed and can make the following attack once against each enemy you move adjacent to during the shift.
Dancer on the Sea of Battle.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Master of Winds Stance.name: Master of Winds Stance
Master of Winds Stance.flavor: Wind whips around you, taking you where you need to go, not where anyone else would send you.
Master of Winds Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, when you are pulled, pushed, or slid by any enemy, you can use a free action at the end of the forced movement to shift the same number of squares that you were moved.

Stance of the Still Sword.name: Stance of the Still Sword
Stance of the Still Sword.flavor: You cast aside thoughts of battle, and your foes are compelled to do the same.
Stance of the Still Sword.effect: Until the stance ends, enemies take a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you.

Death's Chilled Embrace [Attack Techniqu.name: Death's Chilled Embrace [Attack Technique]
Death's Chilled Embrace [Attack Techniqu.flavor: Your touch roots your foe in place, so when it is forced to move, its flesh cracks like breaking ice.
Death's Chilled Embrace [Attack Techniqu.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. Until this immobilization ends, the target takes damage equal to 5 + twice your Strength modifier when it is hit by any attack that pulls, pushes, or slides it.
Death's Chilled Embrace [Attack Techniqu.effect: You move your speed + 2. You can use the attack technique at any point during this movement.

Whirlwind Kick [Attack Technique].name: Whirlwind Kick [Attack Technique]
Whirlwind Kick [Attack Technique].flavor: You spin at incredible speeds, creating a vortex of wind that draws your foes near. As they sprawl around you, you leap into the air and make your escape.
Whirlwind Kick [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You fly your speed. The first square of this movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Angelic Legion Technique.name: Angelic Legion Technique
Angelic Legion Technique.flavor: You launch yourself at your enemy, forcing it to duel with an overwhelming array of kicks and punches. By compelling the enemy to attack, you lure it into your trap.
Angelic Legion Technique.onHit: 5d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you mark the target (save ends).
Angelic Legion Technique.onMiss: Half damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Angelic Legion Technique.effect: Until this power’s mark ends, you can use a free action to force the target to attack you with its ranged attacks and melee attacks as long as you are within those attacks’ range. Each time the target attacks you, you gain a +4 power bonus to attack rolls against it until the end of your next turn.

Duel in the Heavens.name: Duel in the Heavens
Duel in the Heavens.flavor: You draw on your inner reserves to unleash a deadly kick. Your foe soars through the air, and in a flash you leap after it. For a brief moment, the two of you float in midair until you unleash a second attack that sends it crashing to the ground.
Duel in the Heavens.effect: You slide the target 5 squares and then shift 5 squares to a square adjacent to it. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Duel in the Heavens.secondaryOnHit: 10 + Dexterity modifier damage. The target falls prone, and it is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Duel in the Heavens.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and the target falls prone.
Duel in the Heavens.secondaryeffect: You fly your speed. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

Indomitable Technique.name: Indomitable Technique
Indomitable Technique.flavor: At one moment, you were on the edge of death. The next moment, psionic power courses through you, mending your wounds.
Indomitable Technique.trigger: You have 0 hit points or fewer at the start of your turn
Indomitable Technique.effect: You spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your bloodied value.

Wind Walker.name: Wind Walker
Wind Walker.flavor: You step through the air, relying on your focus and psionic power to fly with the same ease others walk.
Wind Walker.effect: You fly your speed. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Legion of One [Attack Technique].name: Legion of One [Attack Technique]
Legion of One [Attack Technique].flavor: The carnage you leave in your wake marks your path through the enemy.

Sunder the Castle [Attack Technique].name: Sunder the Castle [Attack Technique]
Sunder the Castle [Attack Technique].flavor: You settle into a fighting posture, and your enemies sense that you are about to unleash an attack capable of pushing a castle off its foundation.
Sunder the Castle [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier and knock it prone.
Sunder the Castle [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 4. During this movement, any enemy that misses you with an opportunity attack falls prone.

Phoenix Dance.name: Phoenix Dance
Phoenix Dance.flavor: You focus your psionic energy and project it outward as a halo of golden flame. You rampage among your foes, burning them as you unleash a series of kicks and punches.
Phoenix Dance.effect: The target takes fire and radiant damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier.
Phoenix Dance.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Strike of the Vulnerable Turtle.name: Strike of the Vulnerable Turtle
Strike of the Vulnerable Turtle.flavor: Your hands become a blur as you make a rapid series of attacks, reducing your foe’s armor to a crumpled ruin.
Strike of the Vulnerable Turtle.onHit: 6d8 + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, attacks against the target’s AC or Reflex are against the lower of the two defenses.
Strike of the Vulnerable Turtle.onMiss: Half damage. Attacks against the target’s AC or Reflex are against the lower of the two defenses (save ends).

Fist of Indomitable Iron [Attack Techniq.name: Fist of Indomitable Iron [Attack Technique]
Fist of Indomitable Iron [Attack Techniq.flavor: Your arm transforms into solid iron as you punch your foe and pierce past its armor.
Fist of Indomitable Iron [Attack Techniq.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. During this movement, you can shift through enemies’ spaces.

Heart-Sundering Strike [Attack Technique.name: Heart-Sundering Strike [Attack Technique]
Heart-Sundering Strike [Attack Technique.flavor: You focus psionic power in your hands, creating a lethal resonance. With a touch, you leave your foe at your mercy.
Heart-Sundering Strike [Attack Technique.onHit: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
Heart-Sundering Strike [Attack Technique.effect: You move your speed + 4. You can use the attack technique at any point during the movement.

Stunning Fist.name: Stunning Fist
Stunning Fist.flavor: Every living creature has weak points, some more subtle than others. You execute the strike of the nine stars, hitting each of your foe’s vulnerable spots.
Stunning Fist.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Stunning Fist.secondaryOnMiss: The target is either dazed or weakened (save ends).

Iron Soul Flurry of Blows.name: Iron Soul Flurry of Blows
Iron Soul Flurry of Blows.flavor: You follow up an initial assault with a quick strike that disorients your enemy, curtailing its combat options.
Iron Soul Flurry of Blows.trigger: You hit with an attack during your turn
Iron Soul Flurry of Blows.target:
One creature
Level 11: One or two creatures
Level 21: Each enemy adjacent to you
Iron Soul Flurry of Blows.effect: The target takes damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier, and it cannot shift until the start of your next turn. If the target was not a target of the triggering attack, it also can’t make opportunity attacks until the end of your turn.
Iron Soul Flurry of Blows.special: You can use this power only once per round.

Lion's Den [Attack Technique].name: Lion's Den [Attack Technique]
Lion's Den [Attack Technique].flavor: You jab, step to the side, then assume an offensive posture from which you can sting any foe that draws near.

bonusPower.name: Lion's Den [Movement Technique]
bonusPower.effect: You shift 1 square and gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Lion's Den [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d6 + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, once per turn as a free action, you can deal damage equal to your Constitution modifier to any enemy that enters a square adjacent to you.
Level 21: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage.

Steel Wind [Attack Technique].name: Steel Wind [Attack Technique]
Steel Wind [Attack Technique].flavor: You streak across the battlefield, then channel a multiple assault against foes that thought themselves out of your reach.
Steel Wind [Attack Technique].target: Each enemy you can see in the blast
Steel Wind [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage.
Steel Wind [Attack Technique].effect: You are no longer marked. You move your speed + 2.

Eagle Claw Strike [Attack Technique].name: Eagle Claw Strike [Attack Technique]
Eagle Claw Strike [Attack Technique].flavor: Your leap is so graceful that you seem to hang in the air for a short period. When you land, you deliver a shattering strike.
Eagle Claw Strike [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to AC equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn. Against an unattended object, this attack deals 2d8 extra damage.
Eagle Claw Strike [Attack Technique].effect: You fly your speed. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Laughing Wind [Attack Technique].name: Laughing Wind [Attack Technique]
Laughing Wind [Attack Technique].flavor: Your attack summons a laughing wind that drags your foes across the battlefield.
Laughing Wind [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, as a free action, you slide any enemy that ends its turn in a square adjacent to you a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Laughing Wind [Attack Technique].effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks. You then move your speed.

Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique].name: Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique]
Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique].flavor: You drive two enemies back with quick strikes, then use the momentum of your attacks to scatter other foes.
Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique].onHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the primary target 1 square. You then shift 1 square and make a secondary attack.
Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique].secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the secondary target 1 square. You then push each enemy adjacent to the secondary target 1 square from the secondary target.
Scattering of Leaves [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance of the jump isn’t limited by your speed.

Stinging Nettles [Attack Technique].name: Stinging Nettles [Attack Technique]
Stinging Nettles [Attack Technique].flavor: Your attack sets you into an optimal defensive position, allowing you to punish any foe with the temerity to strike at you.
Stinging Nettles [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, as a free action, you deal damage equal to your Constitution modifier to any enemy adjacent to you that hits you with a melee attack.
Stinging Nettles [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a light blade or a spear, the target also cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.
Stinging Nettles [Attack Technique].effect: You swap places with one creature adjacent to you.

Swift River Floods [Attack Technique].name: Swift River Floods [Attack Technique]
Swift River Floods [Attack Technique].flavor: Your crashing attack throws your foe off balance to hinder its movement, letting you slip away like fast-flowing water.
Swift River Floods [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Swift River Floods [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a mace or a staff, the target takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Cacophonous Shout.name: Cacophonous Shout
Cacophonous Shout.flavor: You summon a wall of sound that slams into your foes like a battering ram.
Cacophonous Shout.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and you push the target to the nearest unoccupied square outside the blast. The target is deafened until the end of the encounter.
Cacophonous Shout.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Lashing Rain.name: Lashing Rain
Lashing Rain.flavor: Your savage strike draws an enemy close, leaving you in an aggressive stance that lets you punish any foe that approaches you.
Lashing Rain.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Lashing Rain.effect: You assume the lashing rain stance. Once per turn, when an enemy you can see enters a square adjacent to you while you are able to make opportunity attacks, you deal 5 damage to that enemy and slide it 2 squares to any unoccupied square adjacent to you. You are slowed while you are in this stance. You can end the stance as a free action.

Steel Avalanche.name: Steel Avalanche
Steel Avalanche.flavor: You unleash a wave of psionic power that cuts through your foes like steel.
Steel Avalanche.onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Steel Avalanche.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Steel Avalanche.effect: You shift 4 squares to any square adjacent to the blast.

Stunning Palm.name: Stunning Palm
Stunning Palm.flavor: Your psionic energy keeps you focused in combat, and can be released in a stunning blow that knocks a foe senseless.
Stunning Palm.requirement: The power Stunning Palm must be active in order to use this power.
Stunning Palm.onHit: Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).

Fall of Wind.name: Fall of Wind
Fall of Wind.flavor: You have meditated on the nature of the air around you and can control it to cushion your fall.
Fall of Wind.effect: You reduce the damage you take from falling by 5 + one-half your level.

Fighting Fury.name: Fighting Fury
Fighting Fury.flavor: Your discipline and control let you channel your anger into each blow.
Fighting Fury.effect: Until the stance ends, your unarmed melee attacks deal extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Swift Flight.name: Swift Flight
Swift Flight.flavor: Channeling psionic energy through palms pointed at the ground, your simple leap becomes a smooth glide across the battlefield.
Swift Flight.effect: You fly a number of squares equal to your speed + your Wisdom modifier. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Inner Eye Opened [Attack Technique].name: Inner Eye Opened [Attack Technique]
Inner Eye Opened [Attack Technique].flavor: By blocking out the impermanence of the visual world, you shunt the psychic energy of your inner eye into a lethal attack.
Inner Eye Opened [Attack Technique].effect: You swap places with one creature adjacent to you.
Inner Eye Opened [Attack Technique].onHit: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage plus 1d8 psychic damage.

Resounding Strike [Attack Technique].name: Resounding Strike [Attack Technique]
Resounding Strike [Attack Technique].flavor: Your strike sets up subtle vibrations in a foe, so that a subsequent blow triggers a disruptive burst of thunder.
Resounding Strike [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. The next time the target takes damage before the start of your next turn, it takes extra thunder damage equal to 3 + your Strength modifier.

Springing Drake Assault [Attack Techniqu.name: Springing Drake Assault [Attack Technique]
Springing Drake Assault [Attack Techniqu.flavor: You can leap over a foe with no fear of reprisal, then deliver an attack whose momentum drives an enemy wherever you want it to go.
Springing Drake Assault [Attack Techniqu.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Springing Drake Assault [Attack Techniqu.ironSoul: If you make the attack using a light blade or a spear, you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Springing Drake Assault [Attack Techniqu.effect: You jump to any square adjacent to the target. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Undeniable Incitement [Attack Technique].name: Undeniable Incitement [Attack Technique]
Undeniable Incitement [Attack Technique].flavor: Your psionic summons pulls an enemy to you, then the immovable force of your presence sends it hard to the ground.
Undeniable Incitement [Attack Technique].onHit: You pull the target 1 square. If the target ends that movement adjacent to you, it takes 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage and falls prone. You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Undeniable Incitement [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a mace or a staff, the power bonus to AC equals your Constitution modifier.
Undeniable Incitement [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed. You do not provoke opportunity attacks when moving away from enemies adjacent to you at the start of this movement.

Disrupting Fist.name: Disrupting Fist
Disrupting Fist.flavor: You channel psionic energy to empower your attacks, and you can discharge this energy through a blow that disorients your foe.
Disrupting Fist.requirement: The power Disrupting Fist must be active in order to use this power.
Disrupting Fist.onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Disrupting Fist.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Freeze the Life Blood.name: Freeze the Life Blood
Freeze the Life Blood.flavor: Ice rimes your hands and feet, so that your next attack binds the foe in a freezing embrace.
Freeze the Life Blood.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Freeze the Life Blood.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Freeze the Life Blood.effect: While the target is immobilized or slowed by this power, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to the target takes cold damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Resonating Fist.name: Resonating Fist
Resonating Fist.flavor: Your strike reverberates through the enemy, so that each time it faces a new attack, it recalls the pain you wrought.
Resonating Fist.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerability to all damage equal to your Strength modifier (save ends). Whenever you hit the target with an attack, it takes a -2 penalty to its next saving throw against this power’s effect.

Thunderbolt Surge.name: Thunderbolt Surge
Thunderbolt Surge.flavor: You hurl a ball of roiling thunder into the thick of combat, blasting one foe and knocking nearby creatures to the ground.
Thunderbolt Surge.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and each creature adjacent to the target falls prone.

Abundant Step.name: Abundant Step
Abundant Step.flavor: Tapping into the momentum of an enemy’s errant strike, you slip through space to appear where your foe least expects.
Abundant Step.trigger: An adjacent enemy misses you with an attack
Abundant Step.effect: You teleport to any square adjacent to the target. The target grants combat advantage to you for your next attack roll made before the end of your next turn.

Airborne Form.name: Airborne Form
Airborne Form.flavor: You meditate on the wind, assuming a measure of its free-flowing formlessness.
Airborne Form.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to speed, you are insubstantial while moving, and you can move through enemies’ spaces.

Iron Heart Endurance.name: Iron Heart Endurance
Iron Heart Endurance.flavor: The pain of your injuries lets you clear your mind of all distractions, fortifying your fighting spirit.
Iron Heart Endurance.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your Constitution modifier.

Quicksilver Motion.name: Quicksilver Motion
Quicksilver Motion.flavor: You surge through combat in the blink of an eye.
Quicksilver Motion.special: You can use this power only as the first or the last action of your turn.

Arc of the Flashing Storm [Attack Techni.name: Arc of the Flashing Storm [Attack Technique]
Arc of the Flashing Storm [Attack Techni.flavor: You can flash across the battlefield, lightning wrapping around you as you slam your foe back and disrupt its counterattacks.
keywords: Full Discipline, Implement, Lightning, Psionic, Teleportation
Arc of the Flashing Storm [Attack Techni.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier lightning damage, you push the target 2 squares, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Arc of the Flashing Storm [Attack Techni.ironSoul: If you make the attack using a mace or a staff, the target’s penalty to attack rolls against you instead equals your Constitution modifier.

Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].name: Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique]
Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].flavor: You can race into combat unhindered before using a series of quick strikes to punish and scatter your foes like a flock of birds.
Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].primaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 2.
Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].secondaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst other than the primary target
Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the secondary target 2 squares.
Feeding the Doves [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you ignore difficult terrain.

Mountainfall Stomp [Attack Technique].name: Mountainfall Stomp [Attack Technique]
Mountainfall Stomp [Attack Technique].flavor: The earth buckles around you as you drive into your enemy, a vicious kick sending it to the ground and keeping it there.
Mountainfall Stomp [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target stands up before the end of your next turn, that action provokes an opportunity attack from you.
Mountainfall Stomp [Attack Technique].effect: You shift 1 square. Squares adjacent to you then become difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Unity of Steel [Attack Technique].name: Unity of Steel [Attack Technique]
Unity of Steel [Attack Technique].flavor: Allies who press in against a foe grant you some of their strength, increasing the effectiveness of your own attack.
Unity of Steel [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a light blade or a spear, you gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Unity of Steel [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage plus 2 damage for each ally adjacent to the target.
Unity of Steel [Attack Technique].effect: You swap places with one ally adjacent to you.

Finishing Move.name: Finishing Move
Finishing Move.flavor: Your crippling attack can drop a badly injured foe with the devastating finishing move. If the foe falls, other enemies lose their resolve.
Finishing Move.onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends both). If the target has 10 hit points or fewer after this attack is resolved, you reduce it to 0 hit points.
Finishing Move.effect: If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, each enemy within 5 squares of you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you (save ends).

Flying Tiger Assault.name: Flying Tiger Assault
Flying Tiger Assault.flavor: Your flying kick batters your enemy, driving it back as the recoil of your strike lets you dance away.
Flying Tiger Assault.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares.
Flying Tiger Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares.

Immolating Fist.name: Immolating Fist
Immolating Fist.flavor: Fire blazes within your clenched fists to burn those you strike, culminating in an explosive attack that wraps your foes in a shroud of flames.
Immolating Fist.requirement: The power Immolating Fist must be active in order to use this power.
Immolating Fist.onHit: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier damage plus 1d12 fire damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 fire damage.

Uncommon Clarity.name: Uncommon Clarity
Uncommon Clarity.flavor: You attune yourself to your foe’s thoughts, granting you increased accuracy with your attack.
Uncommon Clarity.attack: Dexterity + 2 vs. Reflex. You can score a critical hit with this attack on a roll of 19–20.
Uncommon Clarity.onMiss: Repeat the attack using Dexterity -2 instead of Dexterity + 2. You are then dazed until the start of your next turn. Do not repeat the attack again if it misses.

Adamant Soul.name: Adamant Soul
Adamant Soul.flavor: You coordinate body, mind, and soul to protect you from the energy of your foes’ attacks.
Adamant Soul.trigger: An attack that deals at least one specific damage type hits you
Adamant Soul.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain resistance equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier to all damage types dealt by the triggering attack.

Adamantine Bones.name: Adamantine Bones
Adamantine Bones.flavor: Your ki energy strengthens you from the inside out, reducing the effectiveness of your enemies’ attacks.
Adamantine Bones.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Confirmation of Spirit.name: Confirmation of Spirit
Confirmation of Spirit.flavor: The aftermath of a successful attack confirms your discipline and focus, granting you the strength to fight on.
Confirmation of Spirit.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack
Confirmation of Spirit.effect: You regain hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

Iron Heart Resilience.name: Iron Heart Resilience
Iron Heart Resilience.flavor: You visualize the essence of determination, anchoring yourself against the worst of what your enemies impose upon you.
Iron Heart Resilience.effect: Until the stance ends, you make saving throws at the start of your turn in addition to the end of your turn. You take a -3 penalty to the saving throws granted by this power.

As the Arrow Flies [Attack Technique].name: As the Arrow Flies [Attack Technique]
As the Arrow Flies [Attack Technique].flavor: You can fly like an arrow over other combatants, ready to deliver an attack that pins an enemy where it stands.
As the Arrow Flies [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
As the Arrow Flies [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a light blade or a spear, whenever the target takes damage before the end of your next turn, you can slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you as a free action.
As the Arrow Flies [Attack Technique].effect: You fly your speed. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Resounding Fist [Attack Technique].name: Resounding Fist [Attack Technique]
Resounding Fist [Attack Technique].flavor: Resounding energy from your powerful strike disrupts your foe and grants your allies an opening.
Resounding Fist [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier force damage, and any ally’s attack made against the target deals extra damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn. Against an unattended object, this attack deals 2d10 extra force damage.
Resounding Fist [Attack Technique].effect: You shift 2 squares and gain resist 3 to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Storm's Wake [Attack Technique].name: Storm's Wake [Attack Technique]
Storm's Wake [Attack Technique].flavor: You read the flow of combat to better anticipate attacks as you move, then buttress your own strike with a ki shout that jolts your enemies back.
Storm's Wake [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target and each enemy adjacent to you a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Storm's Wake [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. During this movement, you gain a bonus to all defenses equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].name: Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique]
Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].flavor: You undertake a devastating rush through the thick of combat that makes you harder to hit.
Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the primary target 3 squares.
Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].effect: You shift 3 squares and make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: The secondary target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a mace or a staff, the secondary target also takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Thundering Waterfall [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You move your speed. Each time any enemy misses you with an opportunity attack provoked by this movement, you gain a cumulative +1 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Booming Shout.name: Booming Shout
Booming Shout.flavor: Amplified by psionic power, your voice booms across the battlefield, scattering and disorienting creatures before you.
Booming Shout.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 thunder damage and is deafened (save ends both). In addition, you push the target to the nearest unoccupied square outside the blast.
Booming Shout.aftereffect: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Booming Shout.onMiss: Half damage, you push the target 1 square, and the target takes ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).

Falcon's Rent.name: Falcon's Rent
Falcon's Rent.flavor: You lash out with a psionic strike at foes around you, leaving those enemies reeling and unable to properly defend themselves.
Falcon's Rent.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends both).
Falcon's Rent.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Falcon's Rent.effect: Before or after the attack, you fly your speed. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall.

Mithral Tornado.name: Mithral Tornado
Mithral Tornado.flavor: Twinned attacks send you hurtling across the battlefield, your enemies reeling from a whirlwind of blows.
Mithral Tornado.effect: You move your speed. Any enemy that misses you with an opportunity attack provoked by this movement takes 5 damage. When you end this movement, you make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Mithral Tornado.primaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Mithral Tornado.onHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the primary target is dazed (save ends).
Mithral Tornado.onMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Mithral Tornado.secondaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst other than the primary target
Mithral Tornado.secondaryOnHit: 1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the secondary target is dazed (save ends).

Quickening Assault.name: Quickening Assault
Quickening Assault.flavor: With careful aim and precise movement, you use one devastating attack to set up another.
Quickening Assault.effect: The next monk at-will attack power you use before the end of your next turn deals 1d10 extra damage and deals half damage to one creature it misses.

Still Waters Strike.name: Still Waters Strike
Still Waters Strike.flavor: The physical and mental pain of your strike knocks a foe back, then places you into a waiting posture that invites enemies to attack you at their peril.
Still Waters Strike.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Still Waters Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Still Waters Strike.effect: You grant combat advantage to the target until the start of your next turn. While you grant combat advantage to the target from this power, you can use the Still Waters Attack power.
Still Waters Strike.requirement: The power Still Waters Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Still Waters Strike.trigger: An adjacent enemy hits you with a melee attack

Altered Awareness.name: Altered Awareness
Altered Awareness.flavor: Your successful attack lets you touch a foe’s mind, then fade from its ight.
Altered Awareness.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack
Altered Awareness.effect: You are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Pearl of Black Doubt.name: Pearl of Black Doubt
Pearl of Black Doubt.flavor: As the enemy’s attack goes wide, you plant doubt’s bitter seed in its mind to hamper its fight against you.
Pearl of Black Doubt.trigger: An adjacent enemy misses you with an attack
Pearl of Black Doubt.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy’s attacks. In addition, whenever the triggering enemy misses you with an attack, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls for any attack that includes the triggering enemy made before the end of your next turn.

Sundered Chains.name: Sundered Chains
Sundered Chains.flavor: With the power of your mind, you free your body from constraint.
Sundered Chains.trigger: You start your turn immobilized, restrained, or slowed

Unfailing Resolve.name: Unfailing Resolve
Unfailing Resolve.flavor: Your focus and discipline lets you stay on your feet even though you are at death’s door.
Unfailing Resolve.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer
Unfailing Resolve.effect: Until the stance ends, while you are dying but not dead, dying causes you to be slowed and weakened instead of unconscious.

A Feather's Weight [Attack Technique].name: A Feather's Weight [Attack Technique]
A Feather's Weight [Attack Technique].flavor: A powerful strike leaves your enemy off balance, so that any attack will send it to the ground.
A Feather's Weight [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d12 + Dexterity modifier damage, you slide the target 2 squares, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. The next time the target takes damage before the start of your next turn, the target takes extra damage equal to your Strength modifier and falls prone.
A Feather's Weight [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. You can use the attack technique at any point during this movement.

Feigned Opening [Attack Technique].name: Feigned Opening [Attack Technique]
Feigned Opening [Attack Technique].flavor: You give your enemy a false opening to lure it close, then lash out with brutal force that leaves it reeling.
Feigned Opening [Attack Technique].onHit: You pull the target 2 squares. If you pull the target to a square adjacent to you, it takes 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Feigned Opening [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a mace or a staff, the target takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Feigned Opening [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2. You do not provoke opportunity attacks when moving away from enemies adjacent to you at the start of this movement.

Glare of the Inner Eye [Attack Technique.name: Glare of the Inner Eye [Attack Technique]
Glare of the Inner Eye [Attack Technique.flavor: Your senses expand beyond sight as the power of your inner eye lets you project a mental assault against a distant foe.
Glare of the Inner Eye [Attack Technique.effect: You shift 1 square and swap places with the target, or swap places with the target and shift 1 square.

Leaping Dragon Strike [Attack Technique].name: Leaping Dragon Strike [Attack Technique]
Leaping Dragon Strike [Attack Technique].flavor: You leap into the air to jump over your enemy. When you land, you follow up with a vicious strike that drives the foe back.
Leaping Dragon Strike [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a light blade or a spear, you gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Leaping Dragon Strike [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can use your movement technique as a free action. You then push the target 2 squares.
Leaping Dragon Strike [Attack Technique].effect: You jump to any square adjacent to the target. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Crushing Reprisal.name: Crushing Reprisal
Crushing Reprisal.flavor: Your enemy’s failed attack lets you slip in quickly to deliver a crushing counterstrike.
Crushing Reprisal.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Crushing Reprisal.effect: Before the attack, you shift 2 squares.
Crushing Reprisal.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).

Hare's Panicked Retreat.name: Hare's Panicked Retreat
Hare's Panicked Retreat.flavor: The power of your forceful strike fills your foe with dread, causing it to knock down other enemies as you control its feeble attempts to escape from you.
Hare's Panicked Retreat.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Until this effect ends, whenever the target starts its turn, you can push it 2 squares as a free action. Each enemy adjacent to the target at the end of the push falls prone.
Hare's Panicked Retreat.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target its speed.

Loud Fist Strike.name: Loud Fist Strike
Loud Fist Strike.flavor: Your fast attack sends a foe careening into other enemies, which are blasted back by an explosive clap of thunder.
Loud Fist Strike.effect: Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 2 centered on the primary target.
Loud Fist Strike.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares and knock it prone.
Loud Fist Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 5 squares.
Loud Fist Strike.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
Loud Fist Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier thunder damage, and you push the secondary target 3 squares from the primary target.

Twin Fountain Strike.name: Twin Fountain Strike
Twin Fountain Strike.flavor: As you tumble past your enemies, your attack draws forth a blood-red mist that shrouds them and fills other foes with fear.
Twin Fountain Strike.effect: You shift your speed + 2 and make the following attack against one or two creatures during this movement.
Twin Fountain Strike.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). Until this ongoing damage ends, the target’s space and each square adjacent to it are lightly obscured. Any enemy not immune to fear takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls while it can see squares lightly obscured by this power.

Fallen Needle [Attack Technique].name: Fallen Needle [Attack Technique]
Fallen Needle [Attack Technique].flavor: A single, sharp blow readies you to step away at a moment’s notice.

bonusPower.name: Fallen Needle [Movement Technique]
bonusPower.flavor: A single, sharp blow readies you to step away at a moment’s notice.
bonusPower.effect: You shift 1 square or move 3 squares.

Fallen Needle [Attack Technique].onHit:
1d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.
    Level 21: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage.

Gentle Rainfall [Attack Technique].name: Gentle Rainfall [Attack Technique]
Gentle Rainfall [Attack Technique].flavor: You strike many foes, then evade strikes faster than they thought possible.
Gentle Rainfall [Attack Technique].target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Gentle Rainfall [Attack Technique].effect: You shift 1 square or move 3 squares.

Fallen Hammer in Repose [Attack Techniqu.name: Fallen Hammer in Repose [Attack Technique]
Fallen Hammer in Repose [Attack Techniqu.flavor: You collide bodily with your foe, then rebound to safety. Though you appear out of control, you land balanced and ready.
Fallen Hammer in Repose [Attack Techniqu.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Fallen Hammer in Repose [Attack Techniqu.effect: You shift 1 square or move 3 squares.

Two Falling Feathers [Attack Technique].name: Two Falling Feathers [Attack Technique]
Two Falling Feathers [Attack Technique].flavor: Your strikes bemuse your opponent, allowing you to move it with the lightest touch.
Two Falling Feathers [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 3 squares to any square adjacent to you.
Two Falling Feathers [Attack Technique].effect: Effect: You shift 1 square or move 3 squares.

Torrent of Falling Knives [Attack Techni.name: Torrent of Falling Knives [Attack Technique]
Torrent of Falling Knives [Attack Techni.flavor: Your fingertips pierce steel and flesh effortlessly but come away clean, as you dance among your foes.
Torrent of Falling Knives [Attack Techni.effect: You shift 1 square or move 3 squares.
Torrent of Falling Knives [Attack Techni.target: One, two, or three enemies adjacent to you during your movement

Fall of the Anvil’s Master [Attack Techn.name: Fall of the Anvil’s Master [Attack Technique]
Fall of the Anvil’s Master [Attack Techn.flavor: You strike an enemy with all four limbs, and each blow lands with the weight of an anvil. Once done, you land lightly.
Fall of the Anvil’s Master [Attack Techn.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage. You push the target 3 squares and knock the target prone.
Fall of the Anvil’s Master [Attack Techn.effect: You shift 1 square or move 3 squares.

Storms Fall without Warning [Attack Tech.name: Storms Fall without Warning [Attack Technique]
Storms Fall without Warning [Attack Tech.flavor: You step through thin air to unleash a storm of fingertip strikes on your enemies, doubling them over with phantom pain.
keywords: Full Discipline, Implement, Psionic, Psychic, Teleportation
Storms Fall without Warning [Attack Tech.effect: You teleport up to half your speed.

Empty Body.name: Empty Body
Empty Body.flavor: You exchange the limits of the body for the embrace of pure spirit. In this form, nothing can contain you.
Empty Body.effect: Until the stance ends, you are insubstantial and phasing.

Meditative Vanishing.name: Meditative Vanishing
Meditative Vanishing.flavor: You extend your will to overpower the senses of your enemies, excising your presence from their minds.
Meditative Vanishing.effect: You are invisible to the target until you make an attack against it.

Supreme Parry.name: Supreme Parry
Supreme Parry.flavor: Your weapon blurs as you spin it around you in an impenetrable barrier.
Supreme Parry.effect: You assume the supreme parry stance. Until the stance ends, you add the proficiency bonus of your main weapon as a power bonus to AC and Reflex.

Thousand World Stride.name: Thousand World Stride
Thousand World Stride.flavor: By elevating your consciousness over your physical limitations, you are able to reach the far side of the battle in a single step.
Thousand World Stride.effect: Until the stance ends, you can teleport your speed as a free action.
Thousand World Stride.special: You can take this free action only as the first action of your turn.

Iron Cascade [Attack Technique].name: Iron Cascade [Attack Technique]
Iron Cascade [Attack Technique].flavor: You capture your allies’ spiritual strength, focusing it into an attack whose iron fury crushes your enemy.
Iron Cascade [Attack Technique].ironSoul: If you make the attack using a light blade or a spear, you gain a +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
Iron Cascade [Attack Technique].onHit: 4d8 + Dexterity modifier damage plus 4 damage for each ally adjacent to the target.
Iron Cascade [Attack Technique].effect: You swap places with the target, then shift a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. If the target is an ally, he or she can shift the same number of squares as a free action.

Lightning Throw [Attack Technique].name: Lightning Throw [Attack Technique]
Lightning Throw [Attack Technique].flavor: You can flash through the air to land with explosive force, your melee attack summoning the power of lightning that you hurl at a distant foe.
Lightning Throw [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you make a secondary attack that is a ranged 10 attack. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Lightning Throw [Attack Technique].secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Lightning Throw [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: 2d12 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage, and the secondary target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Lightning Throw [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You fly your speed + 2. If you don’t land at the end of this movement, you fall. Enemies adjacent to you when you land take lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].name: Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique]
Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].flavor: Your vicious strike can knock a foe down, and grants you the power to sweep other nearby enemies to the ground.
Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the primary target prone.
Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].secondaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].secondaryOnHit: You knock the secondary target prone.
Shattered Earth Fall [Attack Technique].secondaryeffect: You shift 3 squares. You can ignore forced movement until the end of your next turn.

Dragon Fist Strike.name: Dragon Fist Strike
Dragon Fist Strike.flavor: You end your prodigious leap with a blow that smashes your enemy to the ground, all other opponents recoiling before you.
Dragon Fist Strike.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any creature that can see you takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls for any attack that includes you as a target.
Dragon Fist Strike.onHit: 4d12 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target falls prone and cannot stand up (save ends).
Dragon Fist Strike.eachFailedSavingThrow: The target is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Dragon Fist Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target falls prone.

Fate's Judgment.name: Fate's Judgment
Fate's Judgment.flavor: An enemy strikes and you make a savage counterattack. If your opponent attacks again, it is punished by the lingering resonance of your fury.
Fate's Judgment.trigger: An adjacent enemy hits you with an attack
Fate's Judgment.onHit: 3d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes 10 damage the first time each turn it makes an attack (save ends).
Fate's Judgment.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 5 damage the first time each turn it makes an attack (save ends).

Four Hidden Sounds.name: Four Hidden Sounds
Four Hidden Sounds.flavor: You center your mind on the four hidden sounds of the natural world. When you speak each sound, you release a potent blast of elemental energy.
Four Hidden Sounds.effect: The fourth time you use this attack in an encounter, the stance ends.
Four Hidden Sounds.special: You can use this power only once per round.
Four Hidden Sounds.requirement: The power Four Hidden Sounds must be active in order to use this power.
Four Hidden Sounds.onHit: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier damage. Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, or lightning. The attack deals damage of this type to each target. You can choose each damage type only once in an encounter.

Glacier's Mantle.name: Glacier's Mantle
Glacier's Mantle.flavor: Frost flares around you as an icy mist, adding lethal cold to your attacks and chilling any foe that comes too close.
Glacier's Mantle.onHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage plus 2d12 cold damage.
Glacier's Mantle.effect: You can enter the glacier’s mantle stance. Until the stance ends, your melee attacks deal 5 extra cold damage. In addition, any enemy that enters a square adjacent to you takes cold damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Strike of Perfect Clarity.name: Strike of Perfect Clarity
Strike of Perfect Clarity.flavor: Your attack is delivered with such masterful balance and form that your foe’s mind turns on itself for daring to challenge you.
Strike of Perfect Clarity.onHit: 4d8 + Dexterity modifier damage plus 2d12 psychic damage.
Strike of Perfect Clarity.onMiss: Repeat the attack against the same target or a different one. Do not repeat the attack again if it misses.

From Earth to Heaven [Attack Technique].name: From Earth to Heaven [Attack Technique]
From Earth to Heaven [Attack Technique].flavor: Your grace and focus flow through your attacks, driving back your enemies and lifting you to safety above the fray.
From Earth to Heaven [Attack Technique].onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
